description:
This plugin allows you to center the chevrons in dropdowns by leveraging the "padding-right" property. The chevron's position is dynamically calculated to align with the center of the defined padding, rather than being fixed to the dropdown's right edge. 


Demo page : https://plugins-playground-23187.bubbleapps.io/version-test/dd_chevron_centering
name: Dropdown Chevron Centering
plugin_instructions:
Once installed, it will automatically apply to all native Bubble dropdown elements.

To center the chevron in your dropdowns, simply adjust the padding-right value in your dropdownâ€™s style settings.

Example:
If you set padding-right to 24px (see demo page) the chevron will be positioned exactly in the center of these 24px.
